title: Linux eject Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux eject command and learn how to use it to eject removable media devices and CD/DVD drives with practical examples.

meta.title: Linux eject Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux eject command and learn how to use it to eject removable media devices and CD/DVD drives with practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, eject command, removable media, CD, DVD, file system, disk utilities

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of the eject Command

verify.name: Verify the eject command
verify.hint: Ensure that the `eject` command is able to eject the CD/DVD drive successfully.

verify.name: Verify the USB drive is ejected
verify.hint: Ensure that the USB drive is no longer listed in the output of the `lsblk` command after running the `eject` command.

verify.name: Verify the CD/DVD drive is ejected
verify.hint: Ensure that the CD/DVD drive is no longer listed in the output of the `lsblk` command after running the `eject` command.
